title: Understanding Excel's Number Format
text: In Excel, numbers can include digits, decimal points, and certain symbols. Think about what characters are typically used in numerical data.

title: Symbols in Numbers
text: Consider symbols that are often used in financial data or scientific notation. These symbols are also considered part of a number in Excel.

title: List the Characters
text: List all the characters that Excel considers as part of a number, including digits and symbols.
